column4: I have ubuntu, vista, and xp installed right now and vista has taken over my mbr. I used to have grub installed on my ubuntu partition but now grub is gone. How can I get it back?
I have ubuntu, vista, and xp installed right now and vista has taken over my mbr. I used to have grub installed on my ubuntu partition but now grub is gone. How can I get it back?
i dont know how to use it though
i had to go to the bathroom
Well, let me boot one and see the steps you have to take
i thought you meant for me to wait for a new release or something :D
lol, i dont think it is being developed anymore

the reason i want to boot to ubuntu is so i can burn my entire root directory to a dvd because im reformatting. a friend told me i could just install ubuntu and then copy all my files from the dvd to the newly installed partition and itd be like i never changed anything
first, boot the disk, press enter twice or so, and then get to the  menu, press down until you get to advanced, then press GRUB, then RESTORE GRUB IN HARD DISK
im going to it, hope it helsp
im going to eat, hope it helps
